books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: A week after giving birth, Detective Lindsay Boxer returns to work to investigate some grisly murders.
books.name: 12TH OF NEVER

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hitman Will Robie uncovers a serious threat as he attempts to take out a fellow assassin who has gone rogue.
books.name: THE HIT

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: In Book 3 of the Clifton Chronicles, the focus shifts to a new generation — Sebastian, the son of Harry and Emma Clifton.
books.name: BEST KEPT SECRET

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A former criminal attorney who has been acquitted of his wife’s murder retreats to his family estate on a rocky New England cliff, where he is comforted by the house’s caretaker amid continuing danger.
books.name: WHISKEY BEACH

books.author: by Sherryl Woods
books.description: Facing a personal crisis, an ambitious woman retreats to the welcoming arms of her family on the North Carolina coast. But the last thing she wants is an unexpected love.
books.name: WIND CHIME POINT

books.author: by Laurann Dohner
books.description: Drugged, Moon has become little more than a dangerous, feral threat, so Dr. Joyce Yards is called in. Book 10 in the New Species series.
books.name: MOON

books.author: by H. M. Ward
books.description: A young woman goes to bed with a sexy man, but complications ensue. The first in a series.
books.name: DAMAGED

books.author: by Rachel Van Dyken
books.description: A Seattle millionaire asks a childhood friend to pretend to be engaged to him. But she reckoned without his brother.
books.name: THE BET

books.author: by John Irving
books.description: A schoolboy who accidentally killed the mother of his best friend turns into a prophet.
books.name: A PRAYER FOR OWEN MEANY

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: In the final installment of the Slammed series, Will tells the story of his complicated relationship with Layken from his own point of view.
books.name: THIS GIRL

books.author: by  Susan Mallery
books.description: Fayrene Hopkins and Ryan Patterson find that what started out as something temporary is beginning to look like the real thing. A Fool’s Gold series novella.
books.name: HALFWAY THERE

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: For Woods Kerrington, the carefree girl who didn’t care what the world thought of her was more breakable than he could ever imagine.
books.name: TWISTED PERFECTION

books.author: by Katy Evans
books.description: Remington Tate, the star of the dangerous underground fighting circuit, sets a woman’s mind ablaze and her body on fire with wanting.
books.name: REAL

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Matthew Quick
books.description: A man recently released from a mental institution has two obsessions: his estranged wife and the Philadelphia Eagles. The basis of the movie.
books.name: THE SILVER LININGS PLAYBOOK
